requirement_tested: A homepage showcasing leadership and business training services
user_persona: A potential client browsing for professional development opportunities.
user_goal: To understand the range of services offered by the consulting firm.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Sarah visits the consulting website for the first time and lands on the homepage. She immediately sees a large hero image with welcoming text about leadership training.
narrative_steps.action: Page loads with full-width hero image.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Hero image with overlay text is displayed prominently.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Service Options
narrative_steps.description: Curious about specific offerings, Sarah scrolls down and notices four distinct service icons—Workshops, Online Classes, Podcasts, and Blog—aligned horizontally beneath the hero section.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll down below the hero image.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Four service icons with labels are visible in a horizontal arrangement.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Workshops
narrative_steps.description: Interested in attending live events, Sarah clicks the 'Workshops' icon hoping to find more details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Workshops' icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the Workshops page where she can see upcoming sessions.

requirement_tested: An e-commerce section for purchasing services directly from the site
user_persona: A corporate HR manager looking to buy training packages for her team.
user_goal: Purchase multiple business training services for company use.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Products
narrative_steps.description: Mark navigates to the e-commerce section to explore available training services. He sees a grid layout of product cards with titles, prices, and short descriptions.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the e-commerce section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Grid of product cards with title, price, description, and 'Add to Cart' button appears.

narrative_steps.title: Adding Items to Cart
narrative_steps.description: After reviewing several options, Mark decides to add two different training modules to his cart by clicking their respective 'Add to Cart' buttons.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Add to Cart' on two different product cards.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each click adds the item to the session-based cart and updates the cart icon count accordingly.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Shopping Cart
narrative_steps.description: Ready to complete his purchase, Mark clicks the cart icon in the top-right corner to proceed to checkout.
narrative_steps.action: Click the persistent shopping cart icon.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the shopping cart page showing selected items and subtotal.

requirement_tested: A workshops page displaying available workshops with descriptions and pricing
user_persona: A mid-level manager interested in personal growth through structured learning.
user_goal: Find and register for an upcoming workshop that fits his schedule.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Workshop Listings
narrative_steps.description: Emily clicks on the 'Workshops' link from the homepage and arrives at the dedicated workshops page. She scans the vertical list of available sessions.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the Workshops page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Vertical list of workshop cards with title, date/time, location, cost, and description is shown.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Suitable Option
narrative_steps.description: She finds a workshop titled 'Leadership Communication Skills' scheduled for next month and checks its details including cost and duration.
narrative_steps.action: Review details of a suitable workshop card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Details like title, date/time, location, cost, and brief description are clearly displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Registering for Workshop
narrative_steps.description: Convinced it meets her needs, Emily clicks the 'Register Now' button for this workshop.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Register Now' button on the chosen workshop card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A confirmation message appears indicating successful registration for the workshop.

requirement_tested: An online classes section with course listings and enrollment options
user_persona: A working professional seeking flexible educational resources.
user_goal: Enroll in an online class to enhance skills while balancing work commitments.

narrative_steps.title: Discovering Courses
narrative_steps.description: James visits the online classes section and browses various courses listed either in a grid or list format. Each course has key information like instructor name and duration.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the Online Classes section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: List/grid of class cards showing title, instructor, duration, module count, and preview video thumbnail is presented.

narrative_steps.title: Previewing Course Content
narrative_steps.description: Intrigued by a course on strategic thinking, James clicks the play icon on its video thumbnail to watch a sample lesson.
narrative_steps.action: Click the play icon on the video thumbnail.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Sample lesson plays in a modal player window without leaving the current page.

narrative_steps.title: Enrolling in Class
narrative_steps.description: Impressed by the preview, James clicks the 'Enroll Now' button for the Strategic Thinking course.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Enroll Now' button for the selected class.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Successfully enrolled in the class and redirected to the user dashboard to access materials.

requirement_tested: A podcasts page hosting audio content with playback functionality
user_persona: A commuter who enjoys listening to educational content during travel.
user_goal: Listen to a podcast episode about leadership challenges.

narrative_steps.title: Finding Episodes
narrative_steps.description: Alex goes to the Podcasts page and sees a vertical list of episodes with titles, release dates, durations, and embedded players.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the Podcasts page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Vertical list of podcast episode cards with metadata and embedded audio controls is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Playback
narrative_steps.description: He selects an episode titled 'Leading Through Change' and presses the play button within the player control bar.
narrative_steps.action: Click the play button on the desired episode's audio player.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Audio playback begins for the selected episode.

narrative_steps.title: Seeking Within Episode
narrative_steps.description: While driving, Alex realizes he missed something important earlier and drags the progress bar backward to re-listen to a segment.
narrative_steps.action: Drag the progress bar of the active audio player.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Playback jumps to the selected point in the episode.

requirement_tested: A blog section featuring articles related to leadership and business training
user_persona: An aspiring leader looking for insights and advice online.
user_goal: Read insightful blog posts on leadership best practices.

narrative_steps.title: Browsing Articles
narrative_steps.description: Lisa navigates to the blog section and finds a responsive grid of article previews. Each preview includes a featured image, title, excerpt, author photo, and publish date.
narrative_steps.action: Go to the Blog section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Article previews are displayed in a responsive grid layout with essential metadata.

narrative_steps.title: Reading Full Article
narrative_steps.description: She clicks on a compelling post titled 'Building Resilient Teams' to read the entire article.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the blog preview card.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the full article page displaying complete content, comments section, and sharing buttons.

requirement_tested: User authentication system for account creation and login
user_persona: A new visitor wanting to track purchased services and access exclusive content.
user_goal: Create an account to personalize experience and save preferences.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Account Creation
narrative_steps.description: David clicks on the 'Login/Register' option and chooses to create a new account. He fills out the registration form with his email and password.
narrative_steps.action: Fill out the registration form and submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New user account is created, and he is automatically logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In Again
narrative_steps.description: Later, after logging out, David returns and uses the login form with his email and password to regain access.
narrative_steps.action: Enter valid credentials in the login form and submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Authenticated successfully and redirected to the user dashboard.

requirement_tested: Shopping cart functionality for selecting and managing purchases
user_persona: A frequent shopper who likes to compare and adjust selections before buying.
user_goal: Customize my shopping cart contents before finalizing the purchase.

narrative_steps.title: Modifying Item Quantity
narrative_steps.description: Maria opens her cart and sees three items. She increases the quantity of one item using the dropdown selector.
narrative_steps.action: Adjust quantity selector for one item in the cart.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Item total and overall subtotal update dynamically based on the new quantity.

narrative_steps.title: Removing Unwanted Item
narrative_steps.description: Noticing she added too many items, Maria removes one product from the cart by clicking its remove button.
narrative_steps.action: Click the remove button for an unwanted item.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Item disappears from the cart, and the updated list with recalculated subtotal is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Proceeding to Checkout
narrative_steps.description: Satisfied with her choices, Maria clicks the 'Proceed to Checkout' button to move forward with payment.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Proceed to Checkout' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the secure checkout flow for completing the purchase.

requirement_tested: Checkout process with payment integration for service purchases
user_persona: A customer ready to finalize their service purchase securely.
user_goal: Complete the purchase process safely and receive confirmation.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Billing Information
narrative_steps.description: During checkout, John fills in his billing address and selects a preferred payment method from the options provided.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in billing/shipping info and select payment method.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Information fields accept input and payment method is selected.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Order Summary
narrative_steps.description: Before paying, John reviews the order summary which lists all selected services, costs, and estimated delivery times.
narrative_steps.action: Review the order summary section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Order summary accurately reflects selected items and associated charges.

narrative_steps.title: Completing Purchase
narrative_steps.description: Confident everything looks correct, John clicks the 'Complete Purchase' button marked with a security lock icon.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Complete Purchase' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Payment processed via external gateway and redirected to order confirmation page showing transaction ID and access details.

requirement_tested: User dashboard for managing purchased services and viewing order history
user_persona: A returning learner who wants easy access to previously bought content.
user_goal: Access purchased courses and review past transactions.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Dashboard Tabs
narrative_steps.description: Returning to the site, Anna logs in and lands on her user dashboard. She sees tabs labeled 'My Services' and 'Order History'.
narrative_steps.action: Log in and land on the dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dashboard with 'My Services' and 'Order History' tabs is visible.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Enrolled Services
narrative_steps.description: Anna clicks the 'My Services' tab to view all her enrolled workshops and classes, each with direct access links.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'My Services' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: List of enrolled services with clickable access links is displayed.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Transaction Records
narrative_steps.description: Wanting to verify a recent payment, Anna switches to the 'Order History' tab to check transaction details.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Order History' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Past transactions with dates, amounts, and statuses are listed for review.

requirement_tested: Responsive design ensuring usability across devices
user_persona: A busy executive checking the site on multiple devices throughout the day.
user_goal: Use the website seamlessly whether on desktop, tablet, or mobile phone.

narrative_steps.title: Using Desktop Browser
narrative_steps.description: At work, Michael accesses the website via desktop browser and sees multi-column layouts for products and articles.
narrative_steps.action: Browse the website on desktop.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Website adapts to multi-column layout optimized for larger screens.

narrative_steps.title: Switching to Tablet View
narrative_steps.description: During lunch break, Michael continues browsing on his tablet and observes the layout adjusting to two columns.
narrative_steps.action: Resize viewport or switch to tablet device.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout fluidly adjusts to two-column view for medium-sized screens.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Mobile Version
narrative_steps.description: On the go, Michael pulls up the site on his smartphone and notices the layout now uses a single column with a hamburger menu.
narrative_steps.action: Access the website on mobile device.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Single-column layout with transformed navigation into hamburger menu is rendered.

requirement_tested: Light cyan background with cadet blue components applied consistently across all pages
user_persona: A visually-oriented designer evaluating brand consistency.
user_goal: Verify that the website maintains uniform color scheme throughout all sections.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Homepage Colors
narrative_steps.description: Emma inspects the homepage and confirms that the background is light cyan and interactive components are styled in cadet blue.
narrative_steps.action: Observe homepage styling.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Background is light cyan (#E0FFFF), and components like buttons and form fields are cadet blue (#5F9EA0).

narrative_steps.title: Checking E-commerce Section
narrative_steps.description: Moving to the e-commerce section, Emma verifies that the same colors persist for backgrounds and component styling.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the e-commerce section.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Consistent application of light cyan background and cadet blue components observed.

narrative_steps.title: Confirming Across All Pages
narrative_steps.description: Emma repeats this inspection across other pages like Workshops, Podcasts, and Dashboard, noting the same color usage.
narrative_steps.action: Visit remaining main pages of the site.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Every visited page utilizes light cyan background and cadet blue components uniformly.

requirement_tested: Frontend application fetching all dynamic data from backend APIs
user_persona: A developer testing the integration between frontend and backend systems.
user_goal: Ensure that all dynamic content comes from backend endpoints rather than being hardcoded.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Dynamic Content
narrative_steps.description: Tom opens the homepage and watches as loading indicators appear briefly before featured services populate from the backend.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Loading state appears temporarily, then data populates from backend API response.

narrative_steps.title: Handling API Errors Gracefully
narrative_steps.description: Simulating a network issue, Tom blocks the API endpoint and reloads the page, expecting to see error messages instead of broken layouts.
narrative_steps.action: Block API endpoint and reload page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Error message appears explaining failed data retrieval without breaking UI structure.

requirement_tested: Backend API connecting to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A DevOps engineer verifying backend database connectivity.
user_goal: Confirm that the backend connects properly to the PostgreSQL instance using predefined settings.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Connection Settings
narrative_steps.description: Raj starts the backend server and ensures it initializes a connection pool to PostgreSQL using the exact environment variables: localhost, port 5432, username myappuser, password myapppassword, and database name myapp.
narrative_steps.action: Start backend server with environment variables set.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server logs confirm successful initialization of PostgreSQL connection pool using specified parameters.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Data Operations
narrative_steps.description: Raj triggers a few API calls that perform CRUD operations against database tables defined in migration files, confirming real-time interaction with stored data.
narrative_steps.action: Trigger API routes that execute database queries.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: API responses reflect accurate reads/writes from/to PostgreSQL tables.

requirement_tested: Repository configuration with package.json supporting npm run install:all and npm run dev commands
user_persona: A new contributor setting up the project locally for the first time.
user_goal: Install dependencies and start both frontend and backend servers efficiently.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Jamie clones the repository and runs the unified install command to get all necessary packages for both frontend and backend projects.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run install:all` from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend dependencies are installed successfully without errors.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Once installations finish, Jamie executes the development launch script to run both applications simultaneously.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend and backend servers start concurrently and are accessible for development.
